createBareMetalAsset.title: Create bare metal asset
createBareMetalAsset.title.tooltip: Bare metal assets are virtual or physical servers that are configured to run your cloud operations.
createBareMetalAsset.assetName.label: Bare metal asset name
createBareMetalAsset.assetName.placehold: Enter the name for the bare metal asset
createBareMetalAsset.namespaceName.label: Namespace
createBareMetalAsset.namespaceName.place: Select a namespace to store the bare metal asset in the cluster
createBareMetalAsset.address.label: Baseboard Management Controller address
createBareMetalAsset.address.labelHelp: The address to communicate with the host's BMC controller. IPMI, iDRAC, iRMC, and Redfish protocols are supported. e.g. ipmi://, idrac://, irmc://, redfish://
createBareMetalAsset.username.label: Username
createBareMetalAsset.password.label: Password
createBareMetalAsset.bootMACAddress.labe: The MAC address of the host's network-connected NIC that will be used to provision the host.
editBareMetalAsset.title: Edit bare metal asset
bareMetalAsset.emptyState.title: No bare metal assets found
bareMetalAsset.tableHeader.name: Name
bareMetalAsset.modal.deleteMultiple.mess: You are about to delete {{assetNum}} bare metal asset(s). The bare metal asset(s) will no longer be available. This action is irreversible.
bareMetalAsset.modal.delete.title: Delete bare metal asset
bareMetalAsset.modal.delete.message: You are about to delete <bold>{{assetName}}</bold>. The bare metal asset will no longer be available. This action is irreversible.
bareMetalAsset.modal.edit.title: Delete bare metal asset
modal.delete.content.batch: Deleting a bare metal asset is irreversible.
bareMetalAsset.rowAction.editAsset.title: Edit asset
bareMetalAsset.statusMessage.UnexpectedR: Unexpected number of resources found on SyncSet
